install.name: Content - YouTube Video Embedding
install.author: Cory Webb
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Cory Webb. All rights reserved.
install.description: With this plugin, you can embed YouTube videos into articles simply by copying and pasting a video URL from YouTube into an article.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Set the width of the YouTube video. The default width is 425 pixels.

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Set the height of the YouTube video. The default width is 344 pixels.
